title: Luke BookBear
author: Luke BookBear
content: Ometeotl 0.5 Bitcoin Gold plating +Ometeotl 0.5 Bitcoin Silver platingNeither coin is loaded.Unopened. I've owned both coins since mint in 2016 by Defcon23.Coins are both located here in the US.Price: 0.02 BTC eachShipping within the US:  FREEInternational shipping:  0.0018 BTCPayment address:  bc1qszmrf8tv83zjrdsa3gjq6rhfrqldpdxxv8dq8n

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: happy to help with escrow if needed/desired.

comments.author: Luke BookBear
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on October 09, 2023, 06:57:08 PMyou are a newbie. you should use the escrow service offered by a trusted member from the collectibles section otherwise no one will take the risk.Will do!  Thanks!

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: I may be wrong but starting price feels a little steep.  Nice coins though,  need better pics .

comments.author: Luke BookBear
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 09, 2023, 07:05:13 PMhappy to help with escrow if needed/desired.Thanks so much, that would be great!

comments.author: Luke BookBear
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on October 09, 2023, 07:18:34 PMI may be wrong but starting price feels a little steep.  Nice coins though,  need better pics . Thanks!  I'll take some better pics now.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Luke BookBear on October 09, 2023, 07:19:17 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 09, 2023, 07:05:13 PMhappy to help with escrow if needed/desired.Thanks so much, that would be great!easiest way is to send me the coins - I can list them for sale or as an auction - when the buyer pays, I send them the coins and send you the funds. second method would involve you keeping possession and buyer paying me to hold the funds - when they confirm receipt, I would release the funds to you.the issue here is if the buyer has bad motives and states the coins never arrive.this is why sending them to the escrow helps to eliminate that. If interested - just shoot me a dm.

comments.author: Luke BookBear
comments.created_time: October 09, 2023, 08:56:51 PMLast edit: October 09, 2023, 09:18:07 PM by Luke BookBear
comments.body: Well... it looks like the guy who minted these coins (defcon23 - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=98372) has been involved in what appears to be suspicious or very odd minting and/or misrepresentation of "Bitcoin Bullion Bars"He hasn't been active on the forum since 2017 either.Here's the thread about the "Bitcoin Bullion Bars" - [WTS] Silver Plated Brass Physical Bitcoin Bars - Limited Edition & numberedhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1111640.0

comments.author: Luke BookBear
comments.body: Here's an article I published on my site back in December 2016 when he sent me the coins (picture included):Defcon23 - stylish and tremendously cool physical Bitcoins - 0.5 Ometeotl gold and silver 2016https://nandibear.com/defcon23-stylish-and-tremendously-cool-physical-bitcoins-ometeotl-gold-and-silver-2016

comments.author: Luke BookBear
comments.body: Defcon23 gifted me the coins in 2016 because I was doing a book giveaway at the time on the Bitcoin.com Forum.I'm a mod over there (nandibear - https://forum.bitcoin.com/nandibear-u4151/) , although nowadays (for a while now) they (whoever really runs Bitcoin.com now) have made it impossible to post, they claim it's broken and cannot be fixed.Here's the book giveaway thread:Free books! Bitcoin book review - episode 2 - Decentralized Applications: Harnessing Bitcoins Blockchain by Siraj Ravalhttps://forum.bitcoin.com/bitcoin-discussion/free-books-bitcoin-book-review-episode-2-decentralized-applications-harnessing-bitcoins-blockchain-by-siraj-raval-t11468.htmlDefcon23's reply in regard to gifting me the coins: https://forum.bitcoin.com/bitcoin-discussion/free-books-bitcoin-book-review-episode-2-decentralized-applications-harnessing-bitcoins-blockchain-by-siraj-raval-t11468.html#p35063

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Defcon was the worst dude. He was a French guy, but was a total asshole drunk who got kicked/booted out of the original slack collectibles channel back in 2018 for some kinda weird ass shit he pulled I can't quite recall, but yeah, he was basically exiled away after that and thankfully has not returned. I think he may have used some alts here and there too back then to bid up his own auctions, but his way of typing/writing style was pretty easy to spot, maybe he did not know about google translate lol IDK.  Anyhow, I always call these the "Oatmeal Coins" since I cannot say the weird pronunciation he gave them hahaha!  Thanks for the funny memories, I had forgotten all about Defcon till this post!

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Very interesting to look at the old thread on the bars. Were these items actually made and shipped? Does anyone own one, have a picture?

comments.author: Luke BookBear

I got a 4-coin set of these but haven't seen them pop up on the forum in recent years. Welcome to the collectibles section here.
